question:
```
Question: Summarize your movement route in the video by combining the specific objects along the way.

Choices:
A. I go from above a row of greenhouses and a street to a nearby football field, ascending and moving right over streets, buildings, and residential areas, then passing factory buildings before reaching the destination.
B. I start above a crosswalk and a street with greenhouses on my left and end at a distant park, flying over cars and buildings before reaching a wider city view.
C. I begin near a parking lot and a cluster of buildings, ascending over hills and residential areas and ending above a series of greenhouses.
D. My journey begins above a football field and ends amidst a collection of factory buildings, passing by residential areas and a main street with traffic.
E. I start near a group of houses and move towards a row of greenhouses, passing over roads with parked cars and trees.


```

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The video starts with a view above a row of greenhouses and a street, then moves over streets, buildings, and residential areas. It continues to ascend and move right, passing factory buildings before reaching the destination. This matches the description in option A.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 47)]
Option: A
Reason: The video starts above a row of greenhouses and a street (0-6s). It then moves over streets, buildings, and residential areas (6-35s). Finally, it passes factory buildings (35-47s) before reaching the destination. This matches the description in option A.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The video starts with a view above a row of greenhouses and a street, then moves over streets, buildings, and residential areas. It continues to ascend and move right, passing factory buildings before reaching the destination. This matches the description in option A.
